text: 'Crocus spp.' (1830) Charles John Robertson (1798-1830), was an English botanical illustrator who lived at Worton House, Isleworth, and was a member of the RSA. He produced illustrations for the Botanical Register and for Transactions of the Royal Horticultural Society of London. ==External links== *Some illustrations Fragaria vesca (1826) ==References== Category:Botanical illustrators
title: Charles John Robertson
